painPoints.description: The website feels dated and uninviting.
supportingQuotes: It looks like something that was kind of put together, and I don't want to offend anyone, but it looks like something that was very simply put together.
The color scheme is not very inviting or exciting either way.
painPoints.frequencySeverity: High - mentioned multiple times with strong emotional language.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: User primarily used the app instead of the website.
painPoints.impactOnUser: User feels confused and overwhelmed by the website, leading to avoidance of it.

painPoints.description: Overwhelming amount of clubs and committees.
supportingQuotes: There's an overwhelming amount of clubs and groups to join.
I did feel a little bit overwhelmed by the committees.
painPoints.frequencySeverity: Medium - mentioned a couple of times with moderate emotional impact.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: User has to sift through and identify shared interests manually.
painPoints.impactOnUser: User may miss out on opportunities due to feeling overwhelmed and uncertain.

painPoints.description: Lack of engaging features on the events page.
supportingQuotes: Having a calendar would be very, very helpful.
It just doesn't seem inviting to me.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: User has to navigate through multiple pages to find event information.
painPoints.impactOnUser: User may find it difficult to stay informed about events, leading to less participation.

supportingQuotes: The homepage looks like you're starting either a surfing club or a lifeguarding club.
It could be a homepage for any club.
painPoints.frequencySeverity: Medium - specifically commented on layout and clarity.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: User has limited engagement with the homepage due to lack of clarity.
painPoints.impactOnUser: User may not understand the purpose of the organization, leading to disinterest.

painPoints.description: The contact page lacks an inviting design.
painPoints.frequencySeverity: Low - mentioned once with mild concern.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: User might not reach out for information due to lack of engagement.
painPoints.impactOnUser: User may not feel comfortable contacting the organization for help or information.

supportingQuotes: I haven't looked at it from a mobile standpoint.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: User may attempt to access the site on mobile but could face usability issues.
painPoints.impactOnUser: User may have a difficult experience accessing information on mobile devices.

painPoints.description: Lack of translation features for accessibility.
supportingQuotes: It needs to have a translation aspect to it.
painPoints.currentWorkarounds: User may need to find alternative resources for translation.
painPoints.impactOnUser: Users who need translation may feel excluded from accessing information.
